participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and friendly, enjoys engaging in conversations and getting to know others.
participant_1.background: i like to take walks. i live in a house. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries. i don't drink soda.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and passionate about animals and sports, enjoys leisure activities with family.
participant_2.background: i have a german shepherd dog. i live is a rural farming community. my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey.

content.text: i have a german shepherd dog. Do you like dogs?
my husband is adopted. do you have a husband?
i like to watch nhl hockey. Do you like sports?
